{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Weapon smith | class = WeaponSmith | game = Strife | doomednum = 116 | convid = 2 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]]→WeaponSmith
A Weapon Smith. Mostly inherited from the [[Classes:Merchant|Merchant]] class. He sells weapons and ammunition. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR WeaponSmith : {{Class|Merchant}} { {{Property|PainSound}} "smith/pain" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_WEAPONSMITH" // "Weapon Smith" }
